Know who you were in your previous Birth

July 16, 2014

Everyone has lot of things in their mind which are not answered till now. The very important thing which many will be having is who they were in their previous birth. It has been very difficult to find who they were in their previous birth. Many scientist and astorologist tried to find the solution for this question. Many were not able to find it.  But now it is possible to find who we were with the help of the technology we have. When it comes to hunt(search) then our best companion will be World best search engine +Google  and no one can beat it.

The result which you get may be similar to the character which you have now. So don't get shocked to know it.

Steps:

  • Goto www.Google.com  
  • Type the following Died [Your date of birth and the year]  example died [30th November 1992]
  • The results will be appearing.
  • The first result which comes will be a Wikipedia Document who you were in the last year.
Share with your friends and family member and give a shocking result to them. Have fun
